Title: Función de regresión lineal múltiple

Source: R/regresionlinealmltiple.R
multi_reg.Rd

Title: Función de regresión lineal múltiple

multi_reg(data, dependent_var, independent_vars)

Arguments

data

Data to be used to fit the multiple linear regression model.

dependent_var

La variable dependiente que se desea predecir mediante el modelo.

independent_vars

Vector with the independent variables that will be used to fit the multiple linear regression model.

Value

Summary of the fitted model and a plot of fitted values

Examples

df <- data.frame(x1 = c(1,2,3,4,5),
                x2 = c(3,4,5,6,7),
                y = c(6,9,12,15,18))
multi_reg(df, "y", c("x1", "x2"))
#> Warning: essentially perfect fit: summary may be unreliable
#>

#>
